SELECT S.SHOW_NO, SHOW_NAME, SHOW_EXPLAIN, PRICE, NOTICE, HALL_NAME, S.HALL_NO HALL_NO, GENRE_NAME, REGION_NAME, SHOW_START, SHOW_END FROM SHOW S JOIN HALL H ON (S.HALL_NO = H.HALL_NO) JOIN GENRE G ON (S.GENRE_NO = G.GENRE_NO) JOIN REGION R ON (S.REGION_NO = R.REGION_NO) WHERE S.STATUS = 'Y' AND S.SHOW_NO = 1
mapper.update: UPDATE SHOWROUND SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE SHOW_DATE < SYSDATE
UPDATE SHOWROUND SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE ROUND_ID IN ( SELECT ROUND_ID FROM SEATS JOIN HALL USING(HALL_NO) WHERE STATUS = 'N' GROUP BY ROUND_ID,TOTAL_SEAT HAVING COUNT(*) = TOTAL_SEAT)
mapper.select: SELECT SHOW_DATE FROM SHOWROUND WHERE SHOW_NO = 1 AND STATUS = 'Y' GROUP BY SHOW_DATE ORDER BY SHOW_DATE
SELECT ROUND_ID, SHOW_ROUND, SHOW_TIME FROM SHOWROUND WHERE SHOW_NO = 1 AND STATUS = 'Y' AND SHOW_DATE = TO_DATE(#{date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REVIEW WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND SHOW_NO = 1

SELECT REVIEW_ID, USER_ID, R.USER_NO USER_NO, REVIEW_SCORE, REVIEW_TITLE, REVIEW_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE FROM REVIEW R JOIN MEMBER M ON (R.USER_NO=M.USER_NO) WHERE R.STATUS = 'Y' AND SHOW_NO = 1 ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC

SELECT REVIEW_ID, USER_ID, REVIEW_SCORE, REVIEW_TITLE, REVIEW_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE FROM REVIEW R JOIN MEMBER USING(USER_NO) WHERE R.STATUS = 'Y' AND (REVIEW_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR REVIEW_CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%') ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SHOW WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND SHOW_NAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
